```{r read-files}
scores <- read.csv('compas-scores-raw.csv')
```

```{r sex-chart}
sex_scores <- scores %>% 
  group_by(Sex_Code_Text) %>% 
  summarize(avg_score = mean(DecileScore))

head(sex_scores)

ggplot(data = sex_scores) +
  geom_col(aes(x = Sex_Code_Text, y = avg_score))
```
